name: Lhcdataanalysis
body:
## Proposed Schedule

### Plots 
1. Make plots for naccess, nusers, totcpu distributions. 
1. Apply a cut to facilitate conversion of dataframes to binary.

### Popularity metric
1. Define naccess, nusers, totcpu for popularity metrics.  

### Machine Learning Algorithm
1. Run any ML algorithm and make predictions for any arbitrary period of time.
2. Check efficiency and make plots for efficiency. 

### Spark
1. Apply a pipeline of the above on Apache Spark platform. Calculate efficiency.

### Rolling Forecast
1. Understand rolling forecasts and apply them on LHC data. 

### Ensembles
1. Try possible ensembles and calculate efficiency.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
